content: feather & fan scarf by elisa purnell copyright august 2009 materials cid 1 worsted weight yarn 400-500 yards sample made with blue heron rayon metallic cid 1 hook size g or size needed for gauge stitch guide cid 1 foundation single_crochet fsc chain 2 insert hook in first chain of chain 2 nearest slip knot *draw up loop 2 loops on hook draw through first loop **chain 1 made - still 2 loops on hook draw through remaining 2 loops fsc made insert hook in chain 1 of previous stitch repeat from * note pattern is a multiple of 17 stitches 34 gives one center shell section 51 gives 2 shell sections to start fsc 34 row 1 right side chain 3 4 double_crochet in first single_crochet working in both loops *skip next single_crochet double_crochet in next single_crochet skip next single_crochet 7 times ** 5 double_crochet in next single_crochet twice repeat from * to last single_crochet end at ** 5 double_crochet in last single_crochet turn row 2 working in front loop only chain 1 single_crochet in each stitch across and in top of chain-3 turn repeat row 1 and 2 for pattern
